faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about JobNachbar
faqPage.contactMessage: We're happy to help. Contact us or use the feedback button.

free.question: Is JobNachbar free?
free.answer: Yes, the basic version is completely free for applicants. You can register, search for jobs and apply without paying a cent. For advanced features like unlimited AI tools, there's JobNachbar Premium.

region.question: Which region does JobNachbar cover?
region.answer: We focus on Zeven and a 30km radius. This includes Rotenburg (Wümme), Bremervörde, Sittensen, Tarmstedt, Scheeßel and many other places.

howApply.question: How do I apply for a job?
howApply.answer: Click on a job, then click 'Apply Now'. You can upload your resume and add a cover letter. The employer receives your application directly.

uploadCv.question: Can I upload my resume?
uploadCv.answer: Yes! Go to your dashboard under 'Profile' and upload your resume as PDF. It will then be sent automatically with every application.

premium.question: What is JobNachbar Premium?
premium.answer: With Premium (€4.99/month) you get unlimited access to our AI tools: Resume Generator, Cover Letter Generator, Interview Coach and more.

notifications.question: How do I find out about new matching jobs?
notifications.answer: Enable email notifications in your profile. We'll then automatically send you new jobs that match your preferences.

dataSafe.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafe.answer: Yes. We store your data GDPR-compliant in Germany. Your profile is only visible to employers you apply to.

cost.question: What does a job posting cost?
cost.answer: We offer various packages - starting from €29 per month. You can find all details on our pricing page.

duration.question: How long does my listing run?
duration.answer: Depending on the package, 30, 60 or 90 days. You can extend or pause it at any time.

multipleJobs.question: Can I post multiple jobs at once?
multipleJobs.answer: Yes, with our Starter and Professional packages you can have multiple positions online simultaneously.

receiveApplications.question: How do applications reach me?
receiveApplications.answer: You'll receive an email notification and can manage and respond to all applications in your dashboard.

whoIsBehind.question: Who is behind JobNachbar?
whoIsBehind.answer: JobNachbar was founded in 2026. Learn more on our 'About Us' page.

feedback.question: I found a bug / have an idea
feedback.answer: Great! Use the feedback button on any page or contact us via the contact form.

deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Send us a short email to info@jobnachbar.com and we'll delete all your data within 48 hours.

mobileApp.question: Is there an app for JobNachbar?
mobileApp.answer: JobNachbar is optimized as a Progressive Web App (PWA). You can add the website to your phone's home screen and use it like an app - no app store download needed.
